I can't believe I haven't done this yet, but here goes...

If you haven't heard yet, the new worship album from Healing Place Church is here. EPIC Worship is the

heartbeat of the next generation of worshipers from Healing Place. The new album contains 13 original songs that you can grab at the HPC Online Store, or you can purchase and download them online at many fine music retailers like iTunes, Amazon.com, Rhapsody, Napster, eMusic, etc. This is not only something that I'm extremely honored to be a part of, but I really believe it captures the heart and passion of the student ministries here at HPC. Sure I'm biased, but hopefully you don't write this off simply as self-promotion. Check it out, I think you'll like it.
